Agency: U.S. Attorney-Southern District of New York
U.S. Attorney-Southern District of New York

Primary Offense: Medicare Parts C and D Enforcement Action

Company: CenterLight Health System, Inc. and CenterLight Healthcare, Inc.
CenterLight Healthcare and CenterLight Health System
Description: The New York Attorney General announced a $47 million settlement with CenterLight Healthcare and CenterLight Health System, resolving allegations that it fraudulently billed Medicaid for services it did not provide to more than 1,200 recipients.
